projects.title: Meal Hub
projects.description:
Project Overview

Meal Hub is a dynamic web application. It offers a variety of features designed to enhance users' culinary experience:

Features

  • Menu Exploration: Users can browse through various meal categories, discovering a wide array of dishes tailored to their preferences.

  • Favorite Meals: A personalized feature allows users to save their favorite meals for easy access and reference.

  • Random Meal Generator: Provides users with a random meal suggestion for culinary inspiration or a surprise dish.

  • About Section: Learn more about the website, its creators, and its development journey through the dedicated About section.

  • Responsive Design: Optimized for various devices, ensuring a seamless experience whether accessed from a desktop, tablet, or mobile phone.

Explore Meal Hub today to discover and enjoy a world of culinary delights!

projects.title: Online eBook Store Project
projects.description:
Project Overview

Developed an online eBook store featuring a variety of books, including story books, study books, joke books, religious books, sports books, and more. This web application offers a seamless user experience for exploring and reading eBooks.

Technologies Used Frontend: React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, daisyUI, CSS & HTML Backend: Node.js, Express.js, bcrypt, Cloudinary, cookie-parser, JWT Database: MongoDB, Mongoose Version Control: Git Key Features

User Authentication: Secure registration and login with JWT-based sessions.
Book Management: Admin panel for book management and Cloudinary integration for cover images.
Browsing and Search: Browse by categories and powerful search functionality.
Book Details: Detailed book views with descriptions and reviews.
User Reviews and Ratings: Users can review and rate books.
Responsive Design: Mobile-friendly interface.

Challenges and Solutions

Scalability: Optimized database queries and efficient data structures.
Security: Implemented robust authentication and authorization.
User Experience: Created an intuitive and engaging UI.

projects.title: Comments Widget
projects.description:
The Hierarchical Commenting System is a dynamic and user-friendly comment widget designed to enhance user interaction on web platforms. This widget allows users to post comments in a hierarchical structure, enabling replies to specific comments, creating nested conversations. Each comment includes features such as editing, deleting, and displaying the time frame of the comment, offering a comprehensive and interactive user experience.

Key Features

  • Hierarchical Commenting: Users can reply to specific comments, forming a tree-like structure for discussions.
  • Edit and Delete Options: Users can edit or delete their comments at any time.
  • Time Frame Display: Each comment shows the time it was posted or last edited.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Built with Ant Design for a sleek and intuitive user interface.

Tech Stack

  • React: For building the dynamic and responsive user interface.
  • HTML: To structure the web content.
  • CSS & node-sass: For styling the widget, including support for SCSS syntax.
  • JavaScript: For handling the logic and interactions.
  • Ant Design: To provide a polished and consistent design framework.
  • moment.js: To manage and display date and time information effectively.
